tetra.stats.source_leech.tooltip: Dealing damage with this weapon restores §d%s Mana§r.
tetra.stats.source_leech.tooltip_short: Dealing damage with this weapon restores §dMana§r.
tetra.stats.spellstrike.tooltip: Spellstriking weapons cast an inscribed spell on the target struck. At 2nd level you gain an 1 §6Amplify Glyph§r at the end of the spell. At 3rd level this glyph's Mana cost are waived!
tetra.stats.spellstrike.tooltip_short: Spellstriking weapons cast a spell on the target struck.
tetra.stats.air_attunement.tooltip: Adds 1 §6Amplify Glyph§r to all Air Elemental School effects inscribed in this weapon. But adds 1 §cDampen Glyph§r to all other elemental glyphs. At 2nd level, this penalty is removed.
tetra.stats.air_attunement.tooltip_short: Adds 1 §6Amplify Glyph§r to all Air Elemental School effects inscribed in this weapon. But adds 1 §cDampen Glyph§r to all other elemental glyphs. At 2nd level, this penalty is removed.

tetra.tooltips.inscribable: Can be inscribed with a §eformless§r spell at a §dScribe's Table§r.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellstrike_1.des: Etch careful engravings into your weapon, allowing it to deliver spells once inscribed in a §dScribe's Table§r.
tetra/schematic/shared/spellstrike_2.des: Etch further intricate patterns into your weapon, increasing its §dSpellstriker§r level by 1.
tetra.improvement.spellstrike.name: Spellstriking
tetra.improvement.spellstrike.descriptio: Spellstriking weapons cast an inscribed spell on the target struck. At 2nd level you gain an 1 §6Amplify Glyph§r at the end of the spell. At 3rd level this glyph's Mana cost are waived!
ars_armiger.spellstrike.invalid: Your spell must not contain a Method!
ars_armiger.spellstrike.cleared: Cleared the spell on the weapon!
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.subtitle: Adding magic to the mundane
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page1.bod: You surmise you can use materials such as Source Gems, Archwood or Magebloom threads in the construction of modular weapons, imbuing the item with higher Magical Capacity and innate power in the form of Source Leech and Spellstriker. Use a Holosphere to see detailed statistics on these materials.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page2.bod: (See weapon above to see available magical parts). Modular weapons made with magical parts gain the Source Leech ability, which restores the your Mana with each successful strike. The more parts with this ability, the more mana you regain.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page3.bod: Modular Weapons with the Spellstriker ability will cast an inscribed spell on any struck targets or blocks (if thrown). The weapon can be inscribed at a Scribe's Table by a spell that must NOT contain a form glyph such as Ignite -> Extend Time.
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page4.bod: You can add the Spellstriking Improvement to a Modualr Weapon's Head/Blade module. And even Hone it into Greater Spellstriking!$(br)Spellstriker has 3 Levels.$(br)§nSpellstriker I§r: The weapon gains the ability to cast the inscribed spell.$(br)§nSpellstriker II§r: The weapon adds 1 Amplify Agument at the end of the spell.$(br)§nSpellstriker III§r The additional Amplify has its Mana costs waived!
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page5.bod: Melee modular weapons can be attuned to a given element. This grants them 1 Spellstriker level and 1 Attunement level. An attuned weapon grants all Effect Glyphs of its matching element 1 Amplify Augment with no additional Mana cost!
ars_armiger.page.tetra_weapons.page6.bod: However, unless the attunement is of 2nd level, all other elemental glyphs present in the inscribed spell will gain 1 Dampen agument applied to them.$(br)$(br)§nNOTE§r: Attunement Level 2 is only possible if you have Ars Elemental installed!
tetra.variant_category.focus.label: Elemental Material
tetra/schematic/sword/focus.name: Elemental Focus
tetra/schematic/sword/focus.description: Attune your weapon to a given element. This grants it §d1 Spellstriker§r level and attunement to a given element. An attuned weapon adds §e1 Amplify§r augment to all glyphs of the matching elemental school, but also adds §c1 Dampen§r augment to all other elemental schools. Once your attunement reaches level 2, this drawback is removed.

An attuned weapon adds §e1 Amplify§r augment to all glyphs of the matching elemental school, but also adds §c1 Dampen§r augment to all other elemental schools. Once your attunement reaches level 2, this drawback is removed.

Once your attunement reaches level 2, this drawback is removed.
